definitions.text: activity that is a malfunction, intrusion, or interruption
examples: the term `distress' connotes some degree of perturbation and emotional upset
he looked around for the source of the disturbance
there was a disturbance of neural function

definitions.text: an unhappy and worried mental state
examples: there was too much anger and disturbance
she didn't realize the upset she caused me
they were amazed by the furious disturbance they had caused

definitions.text: the act of disturbing something or someone; setting something in motion
(psychiatry) a psychological disorder of thought or emotion; a more neutral term than mental illness
electrical or acoustic activity that can disturb communication
